content.heading: HTML Overview
paragraphs: HTML is the universal markup language for creating web pages, enabling text formatting, graphics, links, forms, and tables.

content.heading: Next Steps
paragraphs: Learn CSS to style HTML pages and JavaScript to add interactivity.

content.heading: Publishing a Website
paragraphs: Publish your website via an Internet Service Provider (ISP) or by hosting it on your own server.
ISPs offer fast connections, powerful hardware, and high uptime, while self-hosting provides full control.
